::: {.cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import polars as pl

df = pl.read_csv("https://j.mp/iriscsv")
print(df.filter(pl.col("sepal_length") > 5)
      .groupby("species")
      .agg(pl.all().sum())
)
```
